425:2: athāpareṇa samayena kumārastadanyaiḥ kumārairamātyaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣigrāmavalokayituṃ gacchati sma|
425:3: avalokya ca kṛṣikarmāntamanyata udyānabhūmiṃ praviśati sma|
425:4: saṃvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo'nucaṃkramyamāṇo'nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṃ darśanīyam|
425:7: āsādya ca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma|
425:8: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma|
425:9: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan|
425:11: yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamusaṃpadya viharati sma|
425:12: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma||
425:13: tena ca samayena pañca ṛṣayo bāhyāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ṛddhimanto vihāyasaṃgamā dakṣiṇāyā diśa uttarāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti sma|
425:14: te tasya vanakhaṇḍasyopari gacchantaḥ pratyāhatā iva na śaknuvanti sma gantum|
425:17: gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṃ vṛkṣavṛndāṃ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ|
425:18: vayamiha marūṇāṃ pure cāpyasaktā gatā yakṣagandharvaveśmani cordhvaṃ nabhe niśritā
425:19: ima puna vanakhaṇḍamāsādya sīdāma bhoḥ kasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam||1|| iti||
425:20: atha yā tatra vanakhaṇḍadevatā sā tānṛṣīn gāthayādhyabhāṣat—
425:25: tataste'dhastādavalokayanto'drākṣuḥ kumāraṃ śriyā tejasā ca jājvalyamānam|
425:38: āho vajradharasya caiva pratimā candro'tha sūryo hyayam|
425:39: kāmāgrādhipatiśca vā pratikṛtī rūdrasya kṛṣṇasya vā
425:40: śrīmān lakṣaṇacitritāṅgamanagho buddho'tha vā syādayam||3|| iti||
425:41: tataḥ sā vanadevatā tānṛṣīn gāthayā pratyabhāṣat—
425:42: yā śrī ca vaiśravaṇe ca vai nivasate yā vā sahasrekṣaṇe
425:44: brahme yā ca sahāpatau nivasate kṛṣṇe ca yā ca śriyā
425:45: sā śrī prāpya imaṃ hi śākyatanayaṃ nopaiti kāṃcitkalām||4||
425:46: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante|
425:47: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam|
425:51: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati||5||
425:64: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ|
425:65: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma|
425:69: tato'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam|
425:70: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt|
425:71: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma|
425:72: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata—
425:74: yathā śakro'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate||10||
425:76: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam||11||
425:77: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat|
425:80: hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ|
425:81: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam||12||
425:83: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman|
425:84: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka||13||
425:85: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma|
425:86: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ- mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti|
425:100: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya
425:104: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā
425:113: catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ||19||
425:130: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā
425:135: saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ|
425:146: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā
425:163: tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī|
